sections.heading: Construction
sections.text: and maintenance of headgates, measuring devices and flumes.

sections.heading: Refusal
sections.text:
to construct headgates, flumes or measuring devices: State Engineer may close

ditch or open sluice gate or outlet of reservoir.

sections.heading: Installation
sections.text:
of headgates, measuring devices or flumes by State Engineer; procedure for

payment of expenses.

sections.heading: Contribution
sections.text: of owners or recipients of water for proportionate share of work.

sections.heading: Statement
sections.text:
of expenses constitutes valid lien against property of defaulting co-owner or

recipient of water.

sections.heading: Construction
sections.text:
of ditch or flume: Execution and recording of certificate; commencement and

completion of work.

sections.heading: Examination
sections.text: and survey of private land; condemnation; appeal from findings of appraiser.

sections.heading: Right
sections.text:
of person or entity constructing, operating or maintaining ditch or flume;

prior or existing claim or right not interfered with.

sections.heading: Examination
sections.text: and survey of private land; appropriation of land.

sections.heading: Chapter
sections.text: does not authorize use of state land without authorization from State Land Registrar.

sections.heading: Investigation
sections.text:
of complaint of unlawful removal, damage or destruction of ditch by State

Engineer; reports concerning investigation.

sections.heading: Penalties
sections.text: for violation of chapter, order or regulation.
